    • Uses of DiscreteKernel in denoising

      Methods in denoising with parameters of type DiscreteKernel 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ImageTTAA NonLocalMeans.gaussianStochasticNonLocalMeansDenoise(ImageTTAA img, double filteringStrength, int neighbourhoodRadius, int numSamples, double stdDev, DiscreteKernel dk)
      Performs non-local means, but rather than researching a fixed radius around the target, it randomly samples over the image according to a 2d Gaussian distribution centered on the target pixel.
      static ImageTTAA NonLocalMeans.nonLocalMeansDenoise(ImageTTAA img, double filteringStrength, int neighbourhoodRadius, int researchRadius, DiscreteKernel dk)
      Performs classic Non-local means denoising.
      static ImageTTAA NonLocalMeans.uniformStochasticNonLocalMeansDenoise(ImageTTAA img, double filteringStrength, int neighbourhoodRadius, int numSamples, DiscreteKernel dk)
      Performs non-local means, except that instead of specifying a research radius, patches are taken from a uniformly random distribution around the image.

      Convolves the given image with the given discrete kernel.
